title: Intrigues
description: In the first volume of a new fantasy trilogy, the six heroes of the five-part series The Blending--Lorand, Rio, Vallant, Tamrissa, Jovvi, and Naran--confront new challenges as they assume the leadership of the fledgling republic as they face dark intrigues among their own people, sinister plots by foreign powers, and a malevolent evil enemy of extraordinary power. Original.
author: Sharon Green
